subject: RE: [junit] assertTrue(true)
msgSnippet: ... Depends who your users are.  You have probably never used WebLogic or any kind of application server... In these cases, exception messages are the only way
messageBody:
> From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On
> Behalf Of Elliotte Harold

> Exception messages should not be shown to the end-user,
> period.

Depends who your users are. You have probably never used WebLogic or any
kind of application server...

In these cases, exception messages are the only way users can report
problems, and not only do these messages need to be internationalized, they
are actually written by professional technical writers from all over the
world.

>They are for developers, not for users. As such it's
> not nearly as crucial to localize them since generally either:

Please, understand that there are a lot of profiles out there that are
different from your own experience...

--
CÃ©dric
http://beust.com/weblog
